content: rnds 2-6 knit - - 35 sts round 7 k5 k2tog repeat to end - - 30 sts rnds 8-12 knit - - 30 sts round 13 k4 k2tog repeat to end 23 30 25 sts rnds 14-18 knit 25 30 25 sts round 19 k3 k2tog repeat to end 20 24 20 sts rnds 20-24 knit 20 24 20 sts round 25 k2 k2tog repeat to end 15 18 15 sts rnds 26-31 knit 15 18 15 sts round 32 k1 k2tog repeat to end 10 12 10 sts rnds 33-37 knit 10 12 10 sts © lizzy knits llc 2018 round 38 k2tog repeat to end 5 6 5 sts rnds 39-43 knit 5 6 5 sts round 44 k2tog repeat to end - 3 - sts cut the red yarn from the ball and use a tapestry needle to weave the tail through the remaining 5 3 5 sts weave in all other ends with a tapestry needle use your preferred method of making a pom pom and attach it to the top of the hat enjoy merry christmas love the gates **copyright 2018 erin gates no part of this pattern or photos may be reproduced in any form i do not mind if you sell the finished product but please give pattern credit back to lizzy knits you can follow me on instagram @lizzy_knits and use hashtag #classicsantahat © lizzy knits llc 2018 looking for knitting supplies check out my yarn shop threebirdsyarnstudio com we offer a wide selection of ready to ship yarn and notions from luxury brands be sure to check out all patterns and kits from lizzy knits free shipping on contiguous us orders over $75 join our rewards program to earn cash back on future orders check out our instagram page for shop updates and project photos @threebirdsyarnstudio baah yarn malabrigo we are knitters kits and more… © lizzy knits llc 2018
